item.title: 研究发现，水下扬声器播放来自健康珊瑚礁的声音（如鱼叫声）有助于恢复退化的珊瑚礁。
item.description:
Underwater speakers playing sounds from a healthy reef, such as fish calls, could help restore degraded coral reefs, study finds. https://t.co/fIbs58Eb2N

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 俄亥俄州一位母亲在休假期间将 16 个月大的女儿独自留在家中的婴儿床上 10 天后死亡，周一这位母亲被判处终身监禁，不得假释。
item.description:
An Ohio mother whose 16-month-old daughter died after being left home alone in a playpen for 10 days while she went on vacation was sentenced Monday to life in prison with no chance of parole. https://t.co/zvglPP9yQI pic.twitter.com/M1i9RbezwS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: Dre告诉詹姆斯-科登（James Corden）的播客，在他因脑动脉瘤住院期间，医生告诉他，他还患有三次中风：
item.description:
Dr. Dre is opening up about the time he was hospitalized for a brain aneurysm three years ago.

Dre told James Corden's podcast that while he was hospitalized for a brain aneurysm, doctors told him he also suffered three strokes.

Learn more: https://t.co/XykeBE2tRV pic.twitter.com/XcXbCtyy7g

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: Keri Bergere 描述了上个月在西雅图东部山区被美洲狮袭击的惊险时刻。幸运的是，一群骑自行车的同伴及时伸出援手，挽救了她的生命：
item.description:
Keri Bergere is describing the frightening moment a cougar attacked her last month in the mountains east of Seattle.\

She suffered facial injuries and nerve damage. Luckily, a group of fellow cyclists came to her aid in time to save her life.

More here: https://t.co/bf7iAksgRi pic.twitter.com/jhVfH2h4Ya

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国国会警察总长表示，美国国会警察周一开始佩戴随身摄像机，作为其试点计划的一部分，以保护其警员和国会议员，并增强公众信任。
item.description:
The U.S. Capitol Police on Monday started wearing body-worn cameras as part of its pilot program to protect its officers and members of Congress as well as enhance public trust, the department's chief said. https://t.co/K5l0BXJQMA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 纽约州官员称，一名男子的宠物鳄鱼 "艾伯特 "在家中被非法饲养，该男子正在为保住自己的宠物鳄鱼而斗争。
item.description:
A man is fighting to keep his pet alligator, named "Albert," after New York state officials say it was seized from his home where it was being kept illegally. https://t.co/N33Bs0sAyc pic.twitter.com/qOKB1Oo8Zv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国环保局（EPA）已宣布全面禁止石棉，这种致癌物质每年导致数以万计的美国人死亡。但一些氯漂白剂、刹车片和其他产品中仍在使用石棉：
item.description:
The EPA has announced a comprehensive ban on asbestos, a carcinogen that kills tens of thousands of Americans a year. It is still used in some chlorine bleach, brake pads and other products.

Learn more: https://t.co/5vMrzFRLCM pic.twitter.com/vHXyj8fxoD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 俄亥俄州一位母亲在休假期间将 16 个月大的女儿独自留在家中的婴儿床上 10 天后死亡，周一这位母亲被判处终身监禁，不得假释。
item.description:
An Ohio mother whose 16-month-old daughter died after being left home alone in a playpen for 10 days while she went on vacation was sentenced Monday to life in prison with no chance of parole. https://t.co/qbtQnD4tqi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 首席大法官约翰-罗伯茨（John Roberts）写道，他认为 "没有理由不同意 "下级法院的意见，下级法院也驳回了纳瓦罗的请求。
item.description:
Chief Justice John Roberts wrote that he saw "no reason to disagree" with lower courts, which also rejected Navarro's request.

Navarro's appeal on the merits remains pending, but he will have to begin serving his sentence in the meantime.https://t.co/u2Z5vD3cMt pic.twitter.com/q2cYoo2x4A

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 托比-凯斯被追认为乡村音乐名人堂的一员。
item.description:
Toby Keith has earned a posthumous induction to Country Music Hall of Fame. https://t.co/coch3nACjj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普的律师周一表示，他在获得保释金以履行 4.64 亿美元的民事欺诈判决方面正面临 "难以克服的困难"：
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump is facing "insurmountable difficulties" in obtaining a bond to satisfy the $464 million civil fraud judgment, his attorneys said Monday.

Learn more: https://t.co/qMJwER1zJS pic.twitter.com/HKlGOCL2Cy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 艾伦研究所的研究人员正在开展 "登月 "项目，比如绘制人脑地图，希望借此了解人体器官，帮助防治脑部疾病。
item.description:
Researchers at the Allen Institute are pursing "moonshot" projects, like mapping the human brain, in hopes of understanding the organ and to help fight brain diseases. https://t.co/GN7ReupRBr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 联合国多个组织警告说，加沙一半以上的人口面临 "灾难性饥饿"。
item.description:
Famine is "imminent" in northern Gaza, according to a report released Monday.

Multiple U.N. organizations have warned that more than half the population in Gaza faces "catastrophic hunger."https://t.co/IACv9L3Bcv pic.twitter.com/QDjkBNHv0Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 法官裁定，与 "Access Hollywood "录像带有关的证据可被采纳，Stormy Daniels 可以在特朗普封口费案中作证。
item.description:
Evidence related to the "Access Hollywood" tape is admissible and Stormy Daniels can testify in Trump hush money trial, judge rules. https://t.co/U15qW6o7sL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在消防员努力扑灭康涅狄格州一场房屋火灾的同时，另一项行动也在进行之中--营救一只在楼上阳台上被发现的猫。
item.description:
As firefighters worked to extinguish a house fire in Connecticut, another operation was underway — the rescue of a cat spotted on an upstairs balcony. https://t.co/cWJf37WRyC pic.twitter.com/Oz6th35AcK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 塔卢拉-威利斯（Tallullah Willis）首次公开自己成年后被诊断患有自闭症。这位布鲁斯-威利斯和黛米-摩尔的女儿现年 30 岁，她在社交媒体上透露了自己的诊断结果。
item.description:
Tallullah Willis is opening up for the first time about being diagnosed with autism as an adult. The 30-year-old daughter of Bruce Willis and Demi Moore revealed the diagnosis on social media. https://t.co/Kr7NXaNV6J

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在当地新闻媒体《高谭主义者》（The Gothamist）报道了史坦顿岛一所学校发现数百本新书被扔进垃圾桶的事件后，纽约市教育官员对这一说法进行了调查，其中许多是关于有色人种和男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者身份的新书。
item.description:
NYC education officials investigating claims that hundreds of new books — many that were about people of color and LGBTQ identities — were thrown in the trash at a Staten Island school after local news outlet The Gothamist reported the discovery. https://t.co/DaXN2feEBa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 周一发布的一份报告称，加沙北部 "饥荒迫在眉睫"，因为在以色列-哈马斯战争持续不断的情况下，加沙地带的所有居民都面临着严重的粮食不安全问题。
item.description:
Famine is "imminent" in northern Gaza, as the entire population of the strip experiences high levels of food insecurity amid the ongoing Israel-Hamas war, according to a report released Monday. https://t.co/jywpkdsd1G

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统将于周二在亚利桑那州和内华达州举行竞选活动，在此之前，拜登总统的顾问们阐述了为什么他们仍然认为拜登比特朗普更有优势赢得这两个关键战场。
item.description:
Ahead of Pres. Biden's campaign stops in Arizona and Nevada on Tuesday, advisers are laying out why they still place him in a better position than Trump to win those two key battlegrounds. https://t.co/uv9kB9zWjJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在最高法院拒绝暂缓执行判决后，特朗普白宫前顾问彼得-纳瓦罗必须在周二如期到监狱报到。
item.description:
Former Trump White House adviser Peter Navarro must report to prison on Tuesday as scheduled after Supreme Court denies stay of sentence. https://t.co/dqQ8PIFioR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 据美国国家航空航天局（NASA）称，一颗罕见的巨大彗星将在 71 年来首次与地球擦肩而过，并可能在万众期待的 4 月 8 日日全食期间出现。
item.description:
A rare and massive comet with a devilish nickname is set to pass by Earth for the first time in 71 years and may be visible during the highly anticipated April 8 total solar eclipse, according to NASA. https://t.co/js5hNX13Lq pic.twitter.com/rhSX5rS5WP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国广播公司新闻记者马特-里弗斯（Matt Rivers）报道了海地日益严重的人道主义危机，援助团体警告说，在政治混乱和武装团体暴力的影响下，大约有一百万人面临饥饿的危险。阅读更多
item.description:
ABC News’ Matt Rivers reports on the growing humanitarian crisis in Haiti as aid groups warn that roughly a million people are at risk of starvation amid political chaos and violence by armed groups. violence.

Read more: https://t.co/imc4yUKSoo pic.twitter.com/X14ZS8u9KH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 阿波罗10号的指挥官、宇航员托马斯-斯塔福德（Thomas P. Stafford）周一去世，享年93岁。斯塔福德曾指挥过 1969 年登月和美苏首次太空对接的彩排飞行。
item.description:
Astronaut Thomas P. Stafford, commander of Apollo 10, died Monday at the age of 93. Stafford had commanded a dress rehearsal flight for the 1969 moon landing and the first U.S.-Soviet space linkup. https://t.co/GtvXGBt9PS pic.twitter.com/oZjkSEn9sq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 拜登说服内塔尼亚胡派代表团前往华盛顿，以解决拉法入侵问题上的僵局。
item.description:
Biden gets Netanyahu to send delegation to Washington to resolve standoff over Rafah invasion. https://t.co/k5lekFXlQv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 最近，一个蹒跚学步的孩子在妈妈分享了一段姐姐从幼儿园回家后小宝宝激动反应的视频后，俘获了网友的心。
item.description:
A toddler recently captured the internet's heart after her mom shared a video of the little one's thrilled reaction to her older sister coming home from preschool.https://t.co/j10RhDMoLI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 继犹他州、加利福尼亚州、英格兰和罗马尼亚出现类似方尖碑之后，威尔士泥泞悬崖上新发现的一块 10 英尺高的银色巨石再次引发了人们对其起源的疯狂猜测。
item.description:
A newly discovered 10-foot-tall silver monolith on a muddy bluff in Wales has reignited wild speculation on its origin after similar obelisks appeared in Utah, California, England and Romania. https://t.co/iqYrSeSeO8 pic.twitter.com/esl4pAiYfo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 周日，一名 1 岁女童被 Uber 司机撞倒后死亡，据当局称，当时 Uber 司机刚把她的家人送到休斯顿的一个公寓大楼，当他把车开走时，显然没有看到她在车前。
item.description:
A 1-year-old girl died Sunday after being hit by an Uber driver who had just dropped her family off at an apartment complex in Houston and apparently didn’t see her in front of his car as he pulled away, authorities said. https://t.co/MAMaHsGtpS pic.twitter.com/Vv5vZHzvDF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 据白宫称，拜登总统周一签署了一项行政命令，将指示联邦机构优先投资于妇女健康研究。
item.description:
Pres. Biden signed an executive order Monday that will direct federal agencies to prioritize investments in women’s health research, according to the White House. https://t.co/IDA7dPTx1b pic.twitter.com/cUc37rIBtm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 德文-阿彻（Devon Archer）是众议院共和党人对拜登总统进行弹劾调查的关键证人，他将不会出席本周举行的一场备受瞩目的公开听证会，理由是他的律师认为准备时间 "明显不合理"。
item.description:
Devon Archer, a key witness in House Republicans' impeachment inquiry into Pres. Biden, will not attend a high-profile open hearing this week, citing what his attorney characterized as a "patently unreasonable" amount of time to prepare. https://t.co/WiEENpM2P7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 普京总统在周日俄罗斯精心策划的总统选举中获得第五个任期，在这次投票中不允许有真正的竞争，几乎所有主要反对派人士都被监禁、流放或死亡。
item.description:
Pres. Putin was handed a fifth term in Russia’s heavily stage-managed presidential election Sunday in a vote where no real competition was permitted and with virtually all leading opposition figures jailed, in exile or dead. https://t.co/UeJkw0wb9R

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024
